alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 3:30AM MST until August 21 at 9:30AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... * Until 930 AM MST. * At 330 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain within the Tonto Creek basin which will affect the low water crossings of A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, and Store Crossing along Tonto Creek. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Tonto Basin. The USGS stream gauge at Tonto Creek near Roosevelt is expected to reach or exceed Action Stage of 4.3` within the next few hours. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
